,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\ndelayEvent :: Num t => t -> Event t a -> Event t a\ndelayEvent d e = e{ eventStart = d + eventStart e }\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1045\1097\1105",Space,Str "\1086\1076\1085\1086",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1086\1089\1090\1086\1077",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1077\1086\1073\1088\1072\1079\1086\1074\1072\1085\1080\1077",Space,Str "\1079\1072\1082\1083\1102\1095\1072\1077\1090\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1080\1079\1084\1077\1085\1077\1085\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1072\1089\1096\1090\1072\1073\1072",Space,Str "\1074\1088\1077\1084\1077\1085\1080",Str ",",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1084\1091\1079\1099\1082\1077",Space,Str "\1080\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1072\1085\1080\1084\1072\1094\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1081",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1077\1088\1072\1094\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1086\1090\1074\1077\1090\1089\1090\1074\1091\1077\1090",Space,Str "\1087\1077\1088\1077\1084\1086\1090\1082\1072",Str ".",Space,Str "\1057\1086\1073\1099\1090\1080\1077",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1095\1080\1085\1072\1077\1090",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1086\1080\1089\1093\1086\1076\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1073\1099\1089\1090\1088\1077\1077",Space,Str "\1080\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1077\1076\1083\1077\1085\1085\1077\1077",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nstretchEvent :: Num t => t -> Event t a -> Event t a\nstretchEvent s e = e{ \n    eventStart  = s * eventStart e, \n    eventDur    = s * eventDur   e }\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1044\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1080\1079\1084\1077\1085\1077\1085\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1084\1072\1089\1096\1090\1072\1073\1072",Space,Str "\1074\1088\1077\1084\1077\1085\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1091\1084\1085\1086\1078\1080\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1074\1088\1077\1084\1077\1085\1085\1099\1077",Space,Str "\1087\1072\1088\1072\1084\1077\1090\1088\1099",Space,Str "\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1095\1080\1089\1083\1086",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{s}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1069\1090\1080",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1077\1088\1072\1094\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1078\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1087\1077\1088\1077\1085\1077\1089\1090\1080",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1079\1085\1072\1095\1077\1085\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087\1072",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Track}",Str "."]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\ndelayTrack :: Num t => t -> Track t a -> Track t a\ndelayTrack d (Track t es) = Track (t + d) (map (delayEvent d) es) \n\nstretchTrack :: Num t => t -> Track t a -> Track t a\nstretchTrack s (Track t es) = Track (t * s) (map (stretchEvent s) es) \n\\end{code}\n"
,Header 4 [Str "\1050\1083\1072\1089\1089",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1077\1086\1073\1088\1072\1079\1086\1074\1072\1085\1080\1081",Space,Str "\1074\1086",Space,Str "\1074\1088\1077\1084\1077\1085\1080"]
,Para [Str "\1059",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1089",Space,Str "\1077\1089\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1072\1085\1072\1083\1086\1075\1080\1095\1085\1099\1077",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1077\1088\1072\1094\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1077\1086\1073\1088\1072\1079\1086\1074\1072\1085\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1074\1086",Space,Str "\1074\1088\1077\1084\1077\1085\1080",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1073\1099\1090\1080\1081",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1090\1088\1077\1082\1086\1074",Str ",",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1075\1086\1074\1086\1088\1080\1090",Space,Str "\1086",Space,Str "\1090\1086\1084",Str ",",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1078\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1074\1074\1077\1089\1090\1080",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1077\1094\1080\1072\1083\1100\1085\1099\1081",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089",Str ",",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1090\1086\1088\1099\1081",Space,Str "\1086\1073\1098\1077\1076\1080\1085\1080\1090",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1089\1077\1073\1077",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1080",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1077\1088\1072\1094\1080\1080",Str ".",Space,Str "\1053\1072\1079\1086\1074\1105\1084",Space,Str "\1077\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1086\1084",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Temporal}",Space,Str "(",Str "\1074\1088\1077\1084\1077\1085\1085",Emph [Str "\1086"],Str "\1081",Str ")",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nclass Temporal a where\n    type Dur a :: *\n    dur     :: a -> Dur a\n    delay   :: Dur a -> a -> a\n    stretch :: Dur a -> a -> a\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1042",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1077",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1105\1085",Space,Str "\1086\1076\1080\1085",Space,Str "\1084\1077\1090\1086\1076",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{dur}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1073\1091\1076\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1089\1095\1080\1090\1072\1090\1100",Str ",",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1074\1089\1105",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1086\1080\1089\1093\1086\1076\1080\1090",Space,Str "\1074\1086",Space,Str "\\In{TypeFamilies}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1058\1077\1087\1077\1088\1100",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1083\1077\1075\1082\1086",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1078\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1101\1082\1079\1077\1084\1087\1083\1103\1088\1099",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1072",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Temporal}",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Event}",Space,Str "\1080",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Track}",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\ninstance Num t => Temporal (Event t a) where\n    type Dur (Event t a) = t\n    dur     = eventDur\n    delay   = delayEvent\n    stretch = stretchEvent\n\ninstance Num t => Temporal (Track t a) where\n    type Dur (Track t a) = t\n    dur     = trackDur\n    delay   = delayTrack\n    stretch = stretchTrack    \n\\end{code}\n"
,Header 3 [Str "\1050\1086\1084\1087\1086\1079\1080\1094\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1090\1088\1077\1082\1086\1074"]
,Para [Str "\1054\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1076\1074\1077",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1083\1077\1079\1085\1099\1077",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1084\1091\1079\1099\1082\1077",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1077\1088\1072\1094\1080\1080",Str ":",Space,Str "\1087\1072\1088\1072\1083\1083\1077\1083\1100\1085\1091\1102",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1089\1083\1077\1076\1086\1074\1072\1090\1077\1083\1100\1085\1091\1102",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1084\1087\1086\1079\1080\1094\1080\1102",Space,Str "\1090\1088\1077\1082\1086\1074",Str ".",Space,Str "\1042",Space,Str "\1087\1072\1088\1072\1083\1083\1077\1083\1100\1085\1086\1081",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1084\1087\1086\1079\1080\1094\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1080\1075\1088\1072\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1076\1074\1072",Space,Str "\1090\1088\1077\1082\1072",Space,Str "\1086\1076\1085\1086\1074\1088\1077\1084\1077\1085\1085\1086",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\n(=:=) :: Ord t => Track t a -> Track t a -> Track t a\nTrack t es =:= Track t' es' = Track (max t t') (es ++ es')\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1058\1077\1087\1077\1088\1100",Space,Str "\1086\1073\1097\1072\1103",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1080\1090\1077\1083\1100\1085\1086\1089\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1090\1088\1077\1082\1072",Space,Str "\1088\1072\1074\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1080\1090\1077\1083\1100\1085\1086\1089\1090\1080",Space,Str "\1073\1086\1083\1100\1096\1077\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1080\1079",Space,Str "\1090\1088\1077\1082\1086\1074",Str ",",Space,Str "\1072",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1073\1099\1090\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1074\1082\1083\1102\1095\1072\1102\1090",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1089\1077\1073\1103",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1073\1099\1090\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1082\1072\1078\1076\1086\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1080\1079",Space,Str "\1090\1088\1077\1082\1086\1074",Str ".",Space,Str "\1057",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1084\1086\1097\1100\1102",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1077\1086\1073\1088\1072\1079\1086\1074\1072\1085\1080\1081",Space,Str "\1074\1086",Space,Str "\1074\1088\1077\1084\1077\1085\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1078\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1089\1083\1077\1076\1086\1074\1072\1090\1077\1083\1100\1085\1091\1102",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1084\1087\1086\1079\1080\1094\1080\1102",Str ",",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1089\1084\1077\1089\1090\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1074\1090\1086\1088\1086\1081",Space,Str "\1090\1088\1077\1082",Space,Str "\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1080\1085\1091",Space,Str "\1087\1077\1088\1074\1086\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1089\1099\1075\1088\1072\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1080\1093",Space,Str "\1086\1076\1085\1086\1074\1088\1077\1084\1077\1085\1085\1086",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\n(+:+) :: (Ord t, Num t) => Track t a -> Track t a -> Track t a\n(+:+) a b = a =:= delay (dur a) b\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1055\1088\1080",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1091",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1089",Space,Str "\1082\1072\1082",Space,Str "\1088\1072\1079",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1083\1091\1095\1080\1090\1089\1103",Str ",",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1089\1085\1072\1095\1072\1083\1072",Space,Str "\1089\1099\1075\1088\1072\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1094\1077\1083\1080\1082\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1090\1088\1077\1082",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{a}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1072",Space,Str "\1079\1072\1090\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1090\1088\1077\1082",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{b}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1058\1077\1087\1077\1088\1100",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1072\1085\1072\1083\1086\1075\1080",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1077\1088\1072\1094\1080\1081",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{=:=}",Space,Str "\1080",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{+:+}",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1080\1089\1082\1086\1074",Str ":"]

,Para [Str "\1052\1099",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1078\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1090\1077\1088\1084\1080\1085\1072\1093",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1080\1093",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1077\1088\1072\1094\1080\1081",Space,Str "\1094\1080\1082\1083\1080\1095\1085\1099\1081",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1074\1090\1086\1088",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1073\1099\1090\1080\1081",Str ":"]

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nPrelude Data.Function> :t on\non :: (b -> b -> c) -> (a -> b) -> a -> a -> c\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1058\1077\1087\1077\1088\1100",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1087\1080\1096\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1102",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{mergeInstr}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1054\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1091\1089\1090\1072\1085\1072\1074\1083\1080\1074\1072\1077\1090",Space,Str "\1080\1085\1089\1090\1088\1091\1084\1077\1085\1090\1099",Space,Str "\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1082\1072\1085\1072\1083\1099",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1077\1086\1073\1088\1072\1079\1091\1077\1090",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1073\1099\1090\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1089\1083\1077\1076\1086\1074\1072\1090\1077\1083\1100\1085\1086\1089\1090\1100",Space,Str "midi",Str "-",Str "\1089\1086\1086\1073\1097\1077\1085\1080\1081",Str ".",Space,Str "\1055\1088\1080",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1088\1072\1079\1083\1080\1095\1072\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1086\1073\1097\1077\1085\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1091\1076\1072\1088\1085\1099\1093",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1086\1073\1097\1077\1085\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1074\1089\1077\1093",Space,Str "\1086\1089\1090\1072\1083\1100\1085\1099\1093",Space,Str "\1080\1085\1089\1090\1088\1091\1084\1077\1085\1090\1086\1074",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nmergeInstr :: ([[MidiEvent]], [MidiEvent]) -> M.Track Double\nmergeInstr (instrs, drums) = concat $ drums' : instrs'\n    where instrs' = zipWith setChannel ([0 .. 8] ++ [10 .. 15]) instrs\n          drums'  = setDrumChannel drums  \n\nsetChannel :: M.Channel -> [MidiEvent] -> M.Track Double\nsetChannel = undefined\n\nsetDrumChannel :: [MidiEvent] -> M.Track Double\nsetDrumChannel =  undefined\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1048\1084\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{instrs'}",Space,Str "\1091\1082\1072\1079\1099\1074\1072\1077\1090",Space,Str "\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1089\1083\1077\1076\1086\1074\1072\1090\1077\1083\1100\1085\1086\1089\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1080\1089\1082\1086\1074",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1086\1073\1097\1077\1085\1080\1081",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1082\1072\1078\1076\1086\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1085\1077\1091\1076\1072\1088\1085\1086\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1080\1085\1089\1090\1088\1091\1084\1077\1085\1090\1072",Str ".",Space,Str "\1060\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{setChannel}",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1080\1085\1080\1084\1072\1077\1090",Space,Str "\1085\1086\1084\1077\1088",Space,Str "\1082\1072\1085\1072\1083\1072",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1080\1089\1086\1082",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1073\1099\1090\1080\1081",Str ".",Space,Str "\1055\1086",Space,Str "\1085\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1086\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1089\1090\1088\1086\1080\1090",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1080\1089\1086\1082",Space,Str "midi",Str "-",Str "\1089\1086\1086\1073\1097\1077\1085\1080\1081",Str ".",Space,Str "\1054\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1091",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1102",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nsetChannel :: M.Channel -> [MidiEvent] -> M.Track Double\nsetChannel ch ms = case ms of\n    []      -> []\n    x:xs    -> (0, M.ProgramChange ch (instrId x)) : (fromEvent ch =<< ms)\n    \ninstrId = noteInstr . eventContent\n\nfromEvent :: M.Channel -> MidiEvent -> M.Track Double\nfromEvent = undefined\n\\end{code}\n"

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nfromEvent :: M.Channel -> MidiEvent -> M.Track Double\nfromEvent ch e = [\n    (eventStart e, noteOn n), \n    (eventStart e + eventDur e, noteOff n)]\n    where n = clipToMidi $ eventContent e\n          noteOn  n = M.NoteOn  ch (notePitch n) (noteVolume n)\n          noteOff n = M.NoteOff ch (notePitch n) 0\n\nclipToMidi :: Note -> Note\nclipToMidi n = n { \n    notePitch   = clip $ notePitch n,\n    noteVolume  = clip $ noteVolume n }\n    where clip = max 0 . min 127\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1054\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1074",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1080",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1080",Str ",",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1083\1077\1075\1082\1086",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1078\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1087\1080\1089\1072\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1102",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{setDrumChannel}",Space,Str "\1086\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1087\1077\1088\1077\1074\1086\1076\1080\1090",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1086\1073\1097\1077\1085\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1091\1076\1072\1088\1085\1099\1093",Space,Str "\1080\1085\1089\1090\1088\1091\1084\1077\1085\1090\1086\1074",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "midi",Str "-",Str "\1089\1086\1086\1073\1097\1077\1085\1080\1103",Str ":"]

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nimport Control.Arrow(first, second)\nimport Data.List(sortBy, groupBy, partition)\n...\n\ngroupInstr :: Score -> ([[MidiEvent]], [MidiEvent])\ngroupInstr = first groupByInstrId . \n    partition (not . isDrum . eventContent) . trackEvents\n    where groupByInstrId = groupBy ((==) `on` instrId) . \n                           sortBy  (compare `on` instrId)\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1042",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1077\1085\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1074\1086\1089\1087\1086\1083\1100\1079\1086\1074\1072\1083\1080\1089\1100",Space,Str "\1076\1074\1091\1084\1103",Space,Str "\1085\1086\1074\1099\1084\1080",Space,Str "\1089\1090\1072\1085\1076\1072\1088\1090\1085\1099\1084\1080",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103\1084\1080",Space,Str "\1080\1079",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1076\1091\1083\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Data.List}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1060\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{partition}",Space,Str "\1088\1072\1079\1076\1077\1083\1103\1077\1090",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1080\1089\1086\1082",Space,Str "\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1087\1072\1088\1091",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1080\1089\1082\1086\1074",Str ".",Space,Str "\1042",Space,Str "\1087\1077\1088\1074\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1080\1089\1082\1077",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1093\1086\1076\1103\1090\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1074\1089\1077",Space,Str "\1090\1077",Space,Str "\1101\1083\1077\1084\1077\1085\1090\1099",Str ",",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1090\1086\1088\1099\1093",Space,Str "\1079\1072\1076\1072\1085\1085\1099\1081",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1077\1076\1080\1082\1072\1090",Space,Str "\1074\1077\1088\1085\1091\1083",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{True}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1072",Space,Str "\1074\1086",Space,Str "\1074\1090\1086\1088\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1080\1089\1082\1077",Space,Str "\8211",Space,Str "\1074\1089\1077",Space,Str "\1086\1089\1090\1072\1083\1100\1085\1099\1077",Space,Str "\1101\1083\1077\1084\1077\1085\1090\1099",Space,Str "\1080\1089\1093\1086\1076\1085\1086\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1080\1089\1082\1072",Str ":"]

,Header 2 [Str "\1055\1088\1080\1084\1077\1088"]
,Para [Str "\1054\1087\1080\1088\1072\1103\1089\1100",Space,Str "\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1080\1084\1080\1090\1080\1074\1099",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1084\1087\1086\1079\1080\1094\1080\1080",Str ",",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1090\1086\1088\1099\1077",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1083",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1076\1091\1083\1077",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Score}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1078\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1087\1080\1089\1072\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1084\1077\1083\1086\1076\1080\1102",Str ".",Space,Str "\1053\1080\1078\1077",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1080\1074\1077\1076\1105\1085",Space,Str "\1085\1077\1073\1086\1083\1100\1096\1086\1081",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1080\1084\1077\1088",Str ".",Space,Str "\1048\1085\1089\1090\1088\1091\1084\1077\1085\1090\1099",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nclosedHiHat = drum 42;\t\trideCymbal = drum 59; \t  cabasa = drum 69;\nmaracas     = drum 70;\t\ttom        = drum 45;\n\nflute       = instr 73;\t\tpiano       = instr 0;\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1059\1076\1072\1088\1085\1072\1103",Space,Str "\1089\1077\1082\1094\1080\1103",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nb1 = bam 100\nb0 = bam 84\n\ndrums1 = loop 80 $ chord [\n    tom   $ line [qn b1, qn b0, hnr],\n    maracas $ line [hnr, hn b0] \n    ]\n   \ndrums2 = quieter 20 $ cabasa $ loop 120 $ en $ line [b1, b0, b0, b0, b0]\n\ndrums3 = closedHiHat $ loop 50 $ en (line [b1, loop 12 wnr])\n\ndrums = drums1 =:= drums2 =:= drums3\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1059\1078\1077",Space,Str "\1089\1077\1081\1095\1072\1089",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1078\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1079\1072\1075\1088\1091\1079\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1091",Space,Str "\1087\1072\1088\1090\1080\1102",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1080\1085\1090\1077\1088\1087\1088\1077\1090\1072\1090\1086\1088",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1089\1083\1091\1096\1072\1090\1100",Str ",",Space,Str "\1074\1099\1079\1074\1072\1074",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{out drums}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1040\1082\1082\1086\1088\1076\1099",Space,Str "\1082",Space,Str "\1084\1077\1083\1086\1076\1080\1080",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nc7  = chord [c, e, b]\ngs7 = chord [low af, c, g]\ng7  = chord [low g, low bf, f]\n\nharmony = piano $ loop 12 $ lower 1 $ bn $ line [bn c7, gs7, g7]\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1052\1077\1083\1086\1076\1080\1103",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nac = louder 5\n\nmel1 = bn $ line [bnr, subMel, ac $ stretch (1+1/8) e, c,\n    subMel, enr]\n    where subMel = line [g, stretch 1.5 $ qn g, qn f, qn g]\n\nmel2 = loop 2 $ qn $ line [subMel, ac $ bn ds, c, d, ac $ bn c, c, c, wnr,\n     subMel, ac $ bn g, f, ds, ac $ bn f, ds, ac $ bn c]\n    where subMel = line [ac ds, c, d, ac $ bn c, c, c]\n\nmel3 = loop 2 $ line [pat1 (high c) as g, pat1 g f d] \n    where pat1 a b c = line [pat a, loop 3 qnr, wnr, \n                pat b, qnr, hnr, pat c, qnr, hnr]\n          pat  x     = en (x +:+ x)  \n\nmel = flute $ line [mel1, mel2, mel3]\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1044\1086\1073\1072\1074\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1085\1094\1077",Space,Str "\1079\1074\1091\1082",Space,Str "\1090\1072\1088\1077\1083\1082\1080",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\ncha = delay (dur mel1 + dur mel2) $ loop 10 $ rideCymbal $ delay 1 b1\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1057\1086\1073\1077\1088\1105\1084",Space,Str "\1074\1089\1105",Space,Str "\1074\1084\1077\1089\1090\1077",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1089\1083\1091\1096\1072\1077\1084",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nres = chord [\n        drums, \n        harmony, \n        high mel, \n        louder 40 cha, \n        rest 0]\n\nmain = out res\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1042",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1085\1094\1077",Space,Str "\1089\1090\1086\1080\1090",Space,Str "\1092\1080\1082\1090\1080\1074\1085\1099\1081",Space,Str "\1101\1083\1077\1084\1077\1085\1090",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{rest 0}",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1090\1086\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086\1073\1099",Space,Str "\1073\1099\1083\1086",Space,Str "\1091\1076\1086\1073\1085\1086",Space,Str "\1075\1083\1091\1096\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1080\1085\1089\1090\1088\1091\1084\1077\1085\1090\1099",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1084\1084\1077\1085\1090\1080\1088\1086\1074\1072\1085\1080\1077\1084",Str "."]
,Header 2 [Str "\1069\1092\1092\1077\1082\1090\1080\1074\1085\1086\1077",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1077\1076\1089\1090\1072\1074\1083\1077\1085\1080\1077",Space,Str "\1084\1091\1079\1099\1082\1072\1083\1100\1085\1086\1081",Space,Str "\1085\1086\1090\1072\1094\1080\1080"]
